name: The freaking awesome slalom
description:
Do you like snowboarding or skiing? Do you live on the edge? Well, if you answer YES to the first question, this is your game but also, if you answered YES to the second question I´m afraid to tell you this is only an arcade game, not too risky.

You can choose between snowboarding and skiing and you mision is quite easy, just keep riding as long as possible avoiding all the obstacles and crossing between the flags to get extra points.

The speed increases continuously, so don´t think is gonna be an easy task...

Just swipe you finger on the screen on mobile devices or use the mouse on desktop computers and have fun!
